definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Why is this the transmittable disease whose transmission equates to criminality?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這種病毒傳染源就等同於犯罪呢？

sentences.english: H7 for infectious resource tracing and control.
sentences.chinese: 有效地追蹤溯源和控制傳染源。

sentences.english: Instead, it was more likely to be from an infectious source.
sentences.chinese: 相反，更有可能來自一個傳染源。

sentences.english: This helps to avoid exposure to infection.
sentences.chinese: 這樣有利於避免接觸到傳染源。
